TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartPersonalization extends System.Object

summary.span: 實作低階個人化作業。

span.span: Implements low-level personalization operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會實作執行較低層級的個人化作業所需的邏輯。This class implements the logic required to carry out lower-level personalization operations. 雖然類別會管理個人化的高層級的生命週期，而是類別負責實際實作實體的執行特定的個人化動作的必要步驟。Although the class manages the high-level life cycle of personalization, it is the class that is responsible for actually implementing the physical steps necessary to carry out specific personalization actions. 類別接著會依賴的實作與個人化資訊的基礎資料存放區進行通訊。The class in turn relies on an implementation of to communicate with the underlying data store for personalization information. 如果您使用的預設實作，它會建立的執行個體類別，您可以藉由參考使用屬性。If you use the default implementation of the , it creates an instance of the class that you can use by referencing the property. 例如，若要存取屬性，您會指定`WebPartManager.Personalization.InitialScope`。For example, to access the property, you would specify `WebPartManager.Personalization.InitialScope`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何可用類別，以及提供的個人化範圍如何影響結果的個人化的內容範例。The following code example shows how the class is used, as well as providing an example of how personalization scope affects the results of personalized properties. 此範例中會有 5 個檔案：This example has five files: - .Aspx 頁面，以宣告方式建立兩個 Web 組件區域，每個都有一個控制項。An .aspx page that declaratively creates two Web Part zones, each with a control. - 使用者控制項呼叫`Color.ascx`，可讓使用者變更適用於根據使用者的授權權限修改狀態資訊，然後輸入共用的範圍文字方塊背景色彩的個人化的屬性。A user control called `Color.ascx` that allows a user to change a personalized property that applies a text box background color based on the user's authorization rights to modify state information and to enter shared scope. - 使用者控制項呼叫`Persmode.ascx`，指出目前的頁面範圍的功能和權限目前使用者已輸入共用的範圍，或修改資料; 它也提供兩個按鈕，以變更範圍及重設目前的使用者個人化資訊。A user control called `Persmode.ascx` that indicates what the current page scope is and what rights the current user has to enter shared scope or to modify data; it also provides two buttons; one to change scope and one to reset current user personalization information. - 用來授與使用者登入控制項。A login control that is used to authorize users. - 使用提供的授權使用者修改個人化狀態，並輸入共用的範圍範例區段的 Web.config 檔案。A Web.config file with a section that provides an example of authorizing a user to modify personalization state and to enter shared scope. 下列程式碼會建立與 aspx 頁面和兩個 Web 組件區域，並顯示`Color.ascx`和`Persmode.ascx`控制項。The following code creates an aspx page with a and two Web Part zones and displays the `Color.ascx` and `Persmode.ascx` controls. 在頁面載入用來取得目前的使用者資訊的登入頁面。The page loads a login page that is used to get the current user information. 使用 ASP.NET Web Site Administration Tool，在[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]建立使用者，若要存取的頁面。Use the ASP.NET Web Site Administration Tool in [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] to create users to access the page. 請參閱 Web.config 檔案，如需授與組態檔中的授權的使用者，以變更範圍及修改狀態資訊的範例。See the Web.config file for an example of a user granted authorization in the configuration file to change scope and modify state information. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/Defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#1)] 下列範例程式碼會建立登入頁面。The following example code creates a login page. 成功登入之後，它會重新導向至主要的 aspx 頁面。After a successful login, it redirects to the main aspx page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/login.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/login.aspx#5)] 下列範例程式碼是此應用程式的 Web.config 檔案的一部分。The following example code is a portion of the Web.config file for this application. 本節說明如何設定授權使用者，在此情況下 「 user2 」 中，輸入共用的個人化範圍及修改個人化狀態資訊。This section shows how to set authorization for a user, in this case "user2", to enter shared personalization scope and to modify personalization state information. 它也會顯示在此情況下，可以用來允許輸入共用的個人化範圍，並修改個人化狀態資訊的 「 管理員 」 角色的使用者 「 系統管理員 」 的角色的範例。It also shows an example of a role, in this case "admin", that can be used to allow users in the "admin" role to enter shared personalization scope and to modify personalization state information. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/web.config#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/web.config#2)] 下列範例程式碼會建立一個使用者控制項，呼叫`Color.ascx`，可讓使用者能夠變更個人化的屬性，在此情況下兩個文字方塊中，根據目前的個人化範圍和使用者的授權權限的背景色彩.The following example code creates a user control, called `Color.ascx`, that allows the user to change a personalized property, in this case the background color of two text boxes, based on the current personalization scope and the authorization rights of the user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/color.ascx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/color.ascx#3)] 下列範例程式碼會建立一個使用者控制項，呼叫`Persmode.ascx`，它會顯示目前的個人化範圍和使用者的權限修改狀態，並輸入共用的範圍。The following example code creates a user control, called `Persmode.ascx`, that shows the current personalization scope and the user rights to modify state and to enter shared scope. 它也具有重設 按鈕重設目前的個人化狀態。It also has a reset button for resetting the current personalization state. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/persMode.ascx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/persMode.ascx#4)]

para.span: 類別與密切控制及個人化基礎結構的其餘部分。

span.span: The class works closely with a control and the rest of the personalization infrastructure.

para.span: 個人化的預設實作是非常強大的子系統應該符合您個人化的需求。

span.span: The default implementation of personalization is a very robust subsystem that should meet your personalization needs.

para.span: 在大部分情況下，如果您想要自訂個人化，您可以建立使用的資料提供者，藉由建立類別的個人化提供者繼承自。

span.span: In most cases, if you want to customize personalization, you can create a data provider for use as a personalization provider by creating a class that inherits from .

para.span: 如果您想要建立個人化子系統明顯不同於所提供而類別，您應該建立自訂藉由衍生自實作並新增您自己的自訂邏輯。

span.span: If you want to create a personalization subsystem significantly different from that provided by the and the classes, you should create a custom implementation by deriving from and add your own custom logic.

para.span: 然後建立自訂實作，藉由衍生自，新增您自己的自訂邏輯，並覆寫方法，以傳回您的自訂實作。

span.span: Then create a custom implementation by deriving from , add your own custom logic, and override the method to return your custom implementation.

para.span: 因為控制項的個人化基礎結構，藉由提出要求執行個體控制項不是直接互動或保存參考實作。

span.span: Because a control makes requests to the personalization infrastructure by way of a instance, the control does not directly interact with or hold references to implementations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會對所指定之新範圍中的目前正在執行網頁的個人化範圍`newScope`參數。This method changes the currently executing page's personalization scope to the new scope specified by the `newScope` parameter. 這個方法是受保護的 helper 方法，它會呼叫公用方法。This method is the protected helper method that is called by the public method. 此受保護的方法有處理未來的擴充性，如果有兩個以上可能的範圍之間切換。This protected method exists to handle future extensibility if there are more than two possible scopes to switch between. 如果目前的範圍和`newScope`是相同的值，則這個方法會不執行任何作業。If the current scope and `newScope` are the same value, then this method performs no operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取從個人化狀態`webPartA`以及它套用至`webPartB`。This method extracts the personalization state from `webPartA` and applies it to `webPartB`. 這個方法會假設`webPartA`和`webPartB`都是相同的型別。This method assumes that `webPartA` and `webPartB` are the same type. 如果 Web 組件控制項控制項，方法就會將個人化狀態複製子控制項包裝在`webPartA`給子控制項包裝在`webPartB`。If the Web Parts controls are controls, the method copies the personalization state from the child control wrapped in `webPartA` to the child control wrapped in `webPartB`. 而複製作業的一部分`webPartB`標示為 「 中途的 」。As part of the copy operation, `webPartB` is marked as "dirty".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指出是否要將個人化要求啟用父控制項。This property indicates whether personalization is requested to be enabled for the parent control. 請注意，這是細微但很重要的差異，從的意圖和。Note that this is a subtle but important distinction from the intent of and . 這個屬性只能設定完成之前控制項的方法。This property can only be set prior to the completion of the control's method. 在實務上，這表示屬性必須設定在網頁標記中如果應停用個人化的項目。In practice, this means that the property must be set in the page markup on the element if personalization should be disabled. 或者，此屬性可以在設定`PreInit`階段控制項。Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase of the control.

summary.span: 確認 執行個體已完成初始化，或目前使用者有權修改個人化狀態。

span.span: Ensures that the instance has completed initialization or that the current user has rights to modify personalization state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是協助程式方法，用於數種方法，以確保兩個動作之一：This method is a helper method used in several methods to ensure one of two things: - 執行個體已完成初始化 (例如方法已呼叫且成功完成)。The instance has completed initialization (for example, the method was called and successfully completed). 如果進行這項檢查`ensureModifiable`參數等於`false`。This check is made if the `ensureModifiable` parameter equals `false`. -或--or- - 目前的使用者有權修改個人化狀態。The current user has rights to modify personalization state. 如果進行這項檢查`ensureModifiable`等於`true`。This check is made if `ensureModifiable` equals `true`. 控制項也會呼叫此方法中的案例數目：The control also calls this method in a number of cases: - 若要切換以外的標準模式的顯示模式。To switch the display mode to something other than normal. 目前的使用者必須有權修改個人化狀態。The current user must have rights to modify personalization state. - 新增、 刪除或移動 Web 組件控制項。To add, delete, or move Web Parts controls. 目前的使用者必須有權修改個人化狀態。The current user must have rights to modify personalization state. - 若要連線，請中斷連線，並編輯 Web 組件控制項。To connect, disconnect, and edit Web Parts controls. 目前的使用者必須有權修改個人化狀態。The current user must have rights to modify personalization state. - 若要匯出網頁上的 Web 組件控制項。To export the Web Parts controls on a page. 執行個體必須已完成初始化。The instance must have completed initialization. - 若要匯入 Web 組件控制項。To import Web Parts controls. 目前的使用者必須有權修改個人化狀態。The current user must have rights to modify personalization state.

exception.span: 目前使用者沒有修改個人化資訊的權限，或其他檢查失敗。

span.span: The current user does not have rights to modify personalization information, or other checks failed.
-or-

span.span: returned .

abstract member Load : unit -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope override this.Load : unit -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope

summary.span: 初始化個人化。

span.span: Initializes personalization.

returns.span: 父 的 執行個體。

span.span: A instance for the parent .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是初始化代表父代的個人化資訊的主要進入點控制項。This is the main entry point for initializing personalization information on behalf of the parent control. 會呼叫這個方法在父代控制項的方法。This method is called during the parent control's method. 一般來說，如果已停用其父系的個人化控制項，將永遠不會呼叫這個方法。Normally, if personalization has been disabled on the parent control, this method will never be called. 這個方法期間，會發生下列初始化：During the course of this method, the following initializations occur: - 預設個人化提供者或自訂提供者的參考所示網頁標記或 屬性中取得。A reference to either the default personalization provider, or the custom provider indicated in the page markup or the property, is obtained. - 若要判斷使用者功能稱為提供者 () 目前正在執行的使用者。The provider is called to determine the user capabilities () for the currently executing user. - 目前的頁面/使用者/範圍組合的個人化狀態會從基礎資料存放區載入提供者 () 並儲存在執行個體。The personalization state for the current page/user/scope combination is loaded from the underlying data store by the provider () and stored within the instance. - 目前的頁面/使用者/範圍的個人化範圍取決於提供者 ()。The personalization scope for the current page/user/scope is determined by the provider (). 請注意，此判斷的結果可能的值不同屬性。Note that the result of this determination might be different than the value of the property. 從這個方法傳回的範圍值做為值屬性。The scope value returned from this method is used as the value for the property. > [!NOTE] > 才會發生的例外狀況，因為未啟用個人化直接呼叫方法。An exception due to personalization not being enabled will occur only if the method is called directly. 在 ASP.NET 實作中，一個內部 helper 方法會實際呼叫來執行負載，並這個 helper 方法以無訊息方式傳回未如果將個人化頁面中啟用。In the ASP.NET implementation, an internal helper method is actually called to perform the load, and this helper method silently returns if personalization has not been enabled for the page.

span.span: Resets personalization data for the current page, scope, and user in the underlying data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會重設目前網頁、 範圍和基礎資料存放區中的使用者的個人化資料。This method resets personalization data for the current page, scope, and user in the underlying data store. 重設的副作用，目前正在執行的頁面會重新執行由呼叫。As a side effect of the reset, the currently executing page is re-executed by a call. 請注意這項傳輸重新執行為目前的頁面`GET`不論如何 頁面原先要求的要求。Note that this transfer re-executes the current page as a `GET` request regardless of how the page was originally requested. 在任何時間，就可以呼叫這個方法。This method can be called at any time. 就內部而言，這個方法會呼叫的提供者的方法。Internally, this method calls the method on the provider. 資料已成功重設之後，屬性設定為`true`。After data is successfully reset, the property is set to `true`. 使用這個屬性是在其他地方略過從控制項屬性的個人化資料擷取執行個體，並儲存它，如果已重設資料。This property is used elsewhere by the instance to bypass extracting personalization data from control properties and saving it if data has already been reset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法呼叫期間控制項的事件。This method is called during the control's event. 就內部而言，方法呼叫的提供者的方法。Internally, the method calls the method on the provider. 嘗試儲存個人化資料，目前正在執行的使用者沒有稱為功能時(在目前執行個體) 會導致例外狀況。Attempting to save personalization data when the currently executing user does not have the capability called (within the current instance) results in an exception. 請注意，這只是 true 如果控制項呼叫受保護直接方法。Note that this would only be true if the control called the protected method directly. 在 ASP.NET 實作中，一個內部 helper 方法會實際呼叫來執行檔案中，並這個 helper 方法以無訊息方式傳回目前正在執行的使用者如果並沒有修改資料的權限。In the ASP.NET implementation, an internal helper method is actually called to perform the save, and this helper method silently returns if the currently executing user does not have rights to modify data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`true`，這個方法會標記父控制項作為 「 中途 」。If the property is set to `true`, this method marks the parent control as "dirty". 根據的實作細節控制項的執行個體，這個方法可能會叫用安全性檢查，並在程式碼存取安全性權限檢查。Depending on the implementation details of the control's instance of , this method might invoke security checks and code access security permission checks. 就內部而言，這個方法會呼叫方法。Internally, this method calls the method. 請注意，控制項在內部會追蹤 「 中途 」 狀態，並公開管理員透過 「 dirtiness"屬性而不是透過這個方法。Note that the control tracks "dirty" state internally and exposes the "dirtiness" of the manager through the property rather than through this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，它會指出已重設目前網頁的個人化狀態，以及應該略過擷取個人化資料的控制項和後續儲存作業。If this property is set to `true`, it indicates that the personalization state for the current page has been reset and that extraction of personalization data from controls and subsequent save operations should be skipped. 目前，此屬性會自動設為`true`個人化基礎結構若呼叫方法。Currently, this property is automatically set to `true` by the personalization infrastructure if the method is called. 請注意，雖然當這個屬性可以設定任何限制，此屬性必須設定為`true`之前控制項的事件才能發生效用。Note that although there are no restrictions on when this property can be set, the property must be set to `true` prior to the control's event to have any effect.

summary.span: 將目前網頁的個人化範圍從 切換至 ，或從 切換至 。

span.span: Switches the current page's personalization scope from to or from to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會切換目前正在執行網頁的個人化範圍。This method toggles the currently executing page's personalization scope. 切換範圍會導致回目前正在執行的網頁。Toggling the scope results in a back to the current executing page. 如果呼叫時匯出或匯入 Web 組件控制項正在進行，這個方法會執行任何作業。This method performs no operation if it is called while an export or import of a Web Parts control is occurring. 如果切換範圍要求，就會發生頁面送出透過`POST`要求，則所有查詢字串值將會保留在傳輸期間，如果透過送出頁面上，不會保留查詢字串參數`GET`要求。If a toggle scope request occurs for a page that was submitted via a `POST` request, then any query string values will be preserved during the transfer; query string parameters are not preserved if the page was submitted via a `GET` request. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何使用方法。The following code demonstrates using the method. 此程式碼屬於較大型的程式碼範例中找到的類別描述。This code is part of a larger code sample found in the class description.
